page.title: 03MALDON FARM, COCKLAKE
page.content: {TYPE OF FARM}DAIRY {OCCUPANTS }MR AND MRS HOOPER {ANIMALS }90 FRIESIAN COWS, 5 HEIFERS, 8 BULLOCKS, 1 FRIESIAN BULL, 2 CROSS SADDLEBACK PIGS, 19 PIGLETS, 1 COLLIE DOG {PRODUCE }1000 LITRES MILK PER DAY ,130 ACRES GRASS FOR SILAGE AND GRAZING {WORKERS }3 PEOPLE WORK FULL TIME AND 2PART-TIME WITH THE HAYMAKING {BUILDINGS}CUBICLE HOUSES FOR CATTLE IN WINTER, HAY BARN, IMPLEMENT SHED {MACHINERY}12 MILKING UNITS, 4 TRACTORS 2 MOWERS, 1 HAY BOB, 3 TRAILERS, SPRAYER {BUYING}13 BABY CALVES, 3 COWS, 19 PIGLETS { {PESTS} FLIES {DAILY LIFE }GET UP 6.30 MILKING, CALVES NEED CLEANING, BREAKFAST AT 8.30 CLEAN UP,GENERAL JOBS UNTIL SECOND MILKING, FINISH WORK AT 6.00
